hsla(0,0%,43.1%,.45);border-radius:5px;margin:16px&#125;.markdown-body pre:before&#123;content:"";display:block;height:30px;width:100%;background:url(data:image/png;base64,) 10px 10px no-repeat;background-size:40px&#125;.markdown-body pre>code&#123;font-size:18px;font-weight:400;padding:15px ul&#123;margin-top:3px&#125;.markdown-body ol li&#123;padding-left:6px&#125;@media (max-width:720px)&#123;.markdown-body h1&#123;font-size:24px&#125;.markdown-body h2&#123;font-size:20px&#125;.markdown-body h3&#123;font-size:18px&#125;&#125;</style><h3 data-id="heading-0">前言</h3>
<p>前几日实现文件导出功能时发现文件下载以后在本地打开报错Excel文件损坏无法打开，但是在Postman直接调用是可以的，查阅多方文档后，找到了解决办法，<code>responseType: "blob"</code>属性。</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-1">具体实现</h3>
<p>项目基于axios进行了请求的二次封装具体代码如下：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">sendGet</span>(<span class="hljs-params">
  url: string,
  params: object = &#123;&#125;,
  options: object = &#123;&#125;
</span>): <span class="hljs-title">Promise</span><<span class="hljs-title">any</span>> </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Promise</span>(<span class="hljs-keyword">async</span> (resolve, reject) => &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">try</span> &#123;
      options[<span class="hljs-string">"params"</span>] = params;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> res = <span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> http.get(url, options);
      <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (res) &#123;
        resolve(res);
      &#125;
    &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">catch</span> (e) &#123;
      reject(e);
    &#125;
  &#125;);
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>下载执行的具体接口是：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 接口封装</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-string">`sendGet`</span>
&#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"方法封装地址"</span>;
<span class="hljs-comment">// </span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> loadTemplate = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">data</span> =></span>
    sendGet(<span class="hljs-string">`具体业务接口地址`</span>, data, &#123;
        <span class="hljs-attr">responseType</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"blob"</span>
    &#125;);
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>后端返回的是二进制流数据，如果在接口api定义时不设置<code>responseType: "blob"</code>，下载后的文件就是损坏的。</p>
<p>在页面通过事件触发：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">loadTemplate().then(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">res</span> =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(res);
    createExcelFile(
      res,
      <span class="hljs-string">"模板定义名称"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-string">"application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet"</span>
    );
&#125;);
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>在函数<code>loadTemplate</code>执行成功拿到的res其实就是后端返回的二进制文件流，然后通过<code>createExcelFile</code>下载函数进行文件下载。</p>
<p>文件下载方法为了方便扩展，新增了一个文件类型的字段，可以当参数的形式进行传递，方便多种文件的下载支持。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">/**
 * 文件下载
 * <span class="hljs-doctag">@param <span class="hljs-type">&#123;&#125;</span> <span class="hljs-variable">res</span></span> - 二进制文件流
 * <span class="hljs-doctag">@param <span class="hljs-type">&#123;string&#125;</span> <span class="hljs-variable">fileName</span></span> - 下载后文件名定义
  * <span class="hljs-doctag">@param <span class="hljs-type">&#123;string&#125;</span> <span class="hljs-variable">type</span></span> - 下载的文件类型
 */</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">default</span> (res, fileName, type = <span class="hljs-string">"application/vnd.ms-excel"</span>) => &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> blob = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Blob([res], &#123; <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: type &#125;); <span class="hljs-comment">//type这里表示默认的下载文件类型为xlsx类型</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> downloadElement = <span class="hljs-built_in">document</span>.createElement(<span class="hljs-string">"a"</span>);
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> href = <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.URL.createObjectURL(blob); <span class="hljs-comment">//创建下载的链接</span>
    downloadElement.href = href;
    downloadElement.download = fileName; <span class="hljs-comment">//下载后文件名</span>
    <span class="hljs-built_in">document</span>.body.appendChild(downloadElement);
    downloadElement.click(); <span class="hljs-comment">//点击下载</span>
    <span class="hljs-built_in">document</span>.body.removeChild(downloadElement); <span class="hljs-comment">//下载完成移除元素</span>
    <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.URL.revokeObjectURL(href);
&#125;;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>但是这样就会出现一个问题，如果后端同学没有给你返回二进制文件流就会报错，当然如果约定好了也不会这么做，但是为了避免这样的情况发生，我也做了相应的处理，新增一个判断方法。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 记住，这个地方传入的是response，而不是请求拿到的response.data</span>
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">judgeErrorByResponseType</span>(<span class="hljs-params">response</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Promise</span>(<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">resolve, reject</span>) =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (response.headers[<span class="hljs-string">'content-type'</span>].includes(<span class="hljs-string">'json'</span>)) &#123;
      <span class="hljs-comment">// 此处拿到的data才是blob</span>
      <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> &#123; data &#125; = response
      <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> reader = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> FileReader()
      reader.onload = <span class="hljs-function">() =></span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> &#123; result &#125; = reader
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> errorInfos = <span class="hljs-built_in">JSON</span>.parse(result)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> &#123; msg &#125; = errorInfos
        reject(<span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Error</span>(msg))
      &#125;
      reader.onerror = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">err</span> =></span> &#123;
        reject(err)
      &#125;
      reader.readAsText(data)
    &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> &#123;
      resolve(response)
    &#125;
  &#125;)
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>这个方法的编写的时候对后台也是有要求的，就是要他准确的返回 content-type。如果是 JSON 数据格式的错误信息，就必须得返回application/json。</p>
<p>上面的judgeErrorByResponseType很简单，需要在下载前做个判断就行。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">loadTemplate().then(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">res</span> =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(res);
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> response = judgeErrorByResponseType(res)
    createExcelFile(
      response,
      <span class="hljs-string">"模板定义名称"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-string">"application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet"</span>
    );
&#125;);
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-2">后续</h3>
<p>在查找问题的时候看到很多文章写道mockjs的引入会影响responseType，但是我这里没有用到，作为避坑指南也分享给大家吧<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_42142057/article/details/97655591" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">mockjs影响axios下载responseType属性</a></p>
<p>希望本文可以帮助更多遇到相同的问题的前端同学，让大家少走弯路~~~</p></div>  
</div>
